song.englishname: Shout To The Lord - Darlene Zschech

english.segment1: My Jesus, My Savior, Lord, there is none like You;. All of my days. I want to praise. the wonders of Your mighty love.
english.segment2: My comfort, my shelter, Tower of refuge and strength;. let every breath, all that I am. never cease to worship You.
english.segment3: Shout to the Lord, all the earth, let us sing. power and majesty, praise to the King;. mountains bow down and the seas will roar. at the sound of Your name.
english.segment5: I sing for joy at the work of Your hands, forever I'll love You, forever I'll stand, nothing compares to the promise I have in You.
